column5: Fishing has been hot the past couple of days, we boated 19 walleye/ steelehead Saturday and 18 Walleye Sunday.  Fished Stanley Saturday and landed 15 walleye and 4 rainbows. Fish seemed to be everywhere.  Hot baits were Yeck red monkey puke, NK antifreeze, Silver Streak wonderbread  We caught all of our fish using Musky Torpedo Divers 115' back and Cuda Torpedo Divers 75' back.  Sunday program was the same as yesterday, Lures with 40 and 50 foot leads in front of Cuda Torpedo Divers with line counters set at 75 and 80 and Musky Torpedo Divers line counters set at 120 and 140 feet of line behind the boat.  Hot baits again was Red monkey puke with a silver back Yeck spoon, Poo bear copper Yeck Spoon, NK Antifreeze and wonderbread Silver Streak.
Congrats, whens the fry Thanks for the info
You'd better eat up if you want to go fishing again.
Good to see they are bouncing back down in PS ...thats a good day on the water ...congrats...ummmm wanna trade some salmon for picks?...lol...
Way to show that Son of yours how to catch fish. It's been a great year for the pics.

He certainly loves to fish, today at breakfast he looked out the window and said " Dad I think it's too windy today" put a smile on my face that he is looking for a good day to be on the water  How have you been gbfisher?  It has been an off year for Erie but this recent heat has changed that.
I have friends in Port Elgin. Heard the fishing has been improving, is this true?
